=as (Quenya)=
'''as''' is a [[Quenya]] preposition meaning "with (together)".
==Etymology==
Perhaps from the [[Sundocarme|root]] [[AS]], and perhaps related to ''[[ar]]'' "and".

==Examples==
*''aselye'' "with thee"<ref>{{VT|47}}, p.31</ref><ref>{{VT|43}}, p.29</ref>
==Cognates==
*[[Sindarin]] ''[[ah]]'' (possibly)
=as (Sindarin)=
'''''as''''' is a [[Sindarin]] word meaning 'sunlight'.
==Etymology==
Possibly [[Sundocarme|root]] [[AS]]
==Examples==
* [[Asfaloth]], "Sunlit foam"<ref>{{PE|17}}</ref>
==Cognates==
*[[Quenya]]: ''[[áre]]''
{{references}}
*<small> [[The Languages of Tolkien's Middle-earth]] by [[Ruth S. Noel]]</small>
